Creator: Hopps, Harry R., 1869-1937, artist
Description: Poster shows a roaring gorilla with a German helmet labeled "militarism" holding a bloody club labeled "kultur" and a half-naked woman as he stomps onto the shore of America.
Physical Collection: Texas War Records War Poster collection
